attributes.action: Revoke Article 50 as a matter or urgency and before 29th od March 2019
attributes.additional_details:
By voting so, Parliament has rejected both the Government’s deal and the no-deal alternative. 

This petition asks the Government to support the Parliament's will and revoke Article 50 to avoid a no-deal Brexit.

Under the European Court of Justice ruling of 10th December 2018 the UK can unilaterally revoke Article 50 in accordance with UK's constitutional requirements.
attributes.background: The UK Parliament voted against the Government's deal with the EU on the 12th of March 2019. Parliament also voted against no deal Brexit on the 13th of March 2019.
